title: 'Madama Butterfly' Review: Coming Out of Its Chrysalis

description: First performed in 1945, the 12-part work elegantly blends classical music and jazz, and receives an excellent, overdue studio recording by the contemporary pianist and orchestra.

title: Private-Credit Surge Could Last for Years, Lenders Say
